line_1: The new desire, in stronger fears dissolve.
line_2: Within her panting soul; the firm resolve,

line_1: "This globe, and all which it inherit shall dissolve."
line_2: And in one general ruin shall resolve,

line_1: Disperse, ye Lightnings! and, ye Mists, dissolve!
line_2: Hence in dark heaps, ye gathering Clouds, revolve!
